General.Name: Chengdu RML Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Chengdu RML Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and testing of electronic sensors based on millimeter-wave active phased array micro-systems. The company's products and technologies are used in data link, satellite communication, radar, 5G communications, intelligent driving and space-based Internet, and other fields. It also engages in property rental business. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Chengdu, China.
